pages.title: Devil Ingot: History
pages.text: It started when i was playing a map with my sister and we both were using Vanilla Tweaks enchantment table language font, so we couldn't read anything and my sister typed something in chat that i also couldn't read

pages.title: Devil Ingot: History 2
pages.text: <SophiCreeper>: ᓵᔑ!¡ᒷℸ ̣ ᔑ ╎リ⊣𝙹ℸ. that meant: <SophiCreeper>: CAPETA INGOT, and some days later, i added it to my Youtube Ideas mod but i had a pc formatting and i lost that progress. And so, after some days after Back Math's creation i added the ingot to it by the name "Devil Ingot".
This can be used for: armor, tools, craft decorative blocks, Mystical Agriculture crop and Silent Gear material
